availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert D. Murray (Larue County, Kentucky, attorney & circuit ct clerk)

body.p: Larue County, Kentucky, attorney and court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to M. E. Murray. Father of Francis Murray, Elizabeth Murray, M. C. Murray, and Henry Murray. Attorney in Larue County in 1860. Commonwealth's attorney pro tem in 1861. Clerk of the Larue Circuit Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Hodgensville, p. 146.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863, Legislative Document Series, No. 10 (Frankfort, KY: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 303.
KYR-0001-020-1582.
